channel.title: Know any good hostes beside freehostia.com?
channel.description:
Freehostia.com is literally slowwwwwwwwwww, which I just found out (been slow for about 2 years now (starting in 2005)).
Are there any hostes better then: 250 MB disk space 6 GB bandwidth 3 POP3/IMAP E-mails 1 MySQL Database 10 MB Dabase space 1-click Script Installs
